name: Bible IMP Words Search Puzzle - Play ultimate word search free puzzle and keep your faithlife study bible words in fun way
name_original: Bible IMP Words Search Puzzle - Play ultimate word search free puzzle and keep your faithlife study bible words in fun way
description:
We bring an amazing word search puzzle of important Bible words. Bible - IMP Words Search Puzzle game you will love to play again and again.

Your aim is to find out all the hidden Bible words inside the grid. Hidden Bible words can be found in any orientation. It can be located in up, down, left, right, or diagonal direction. You can also get hidden words in forward or backward direction.

Easy steps to play the game:
- Swipe over the letters in the board to form the Bible words shown below the board/grid.
- To complete the level find out all the listed words.
- Find the words faster and share your best time on your social network & earn 100 game coins each time you share.
- If you stuck somewhere then you can use hint or remove extra character feature, which located at bottom right corner.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
For any assistance please contact us on support@bgnode.com

Try app now and enjoy the game!!!
